title: Blender
description: Industry-standard 3D modeling, sculpting, and animation software. Free, open-source, and incredibly powerful for character design and world building.

title: Aseprite
description: Pixel art animation software with intuitive timeline and onion-skin features. Essential for sprite-based game development and pixel art creation.

title: Procreate
description: Digital painting app for iPad with brush engines and performance optimization. Intuitive and feature-rich for character design and concept art.

title: Game Dev Complete Course
description: Comprehensive video course covering game design, development mechanics, publishing strategy, and industry best practices.

title: Fantasy Worldbuilding Guide
description: Deep dive into creating believable fantasy worlds with culture, geography, history, magic systems, and political intrigue.

title: Digital Art Fundamentals
description: Learn the basics of digital art from color theory to composition, perspective, anatomy, and rendering techniques.

title: Three.js Documentation
description: Comprehensive docs and examples for Three.js 3D JavaScript library. Essential for web-based 3D graphics and interactive experiences.

title: Character Animation Masterclass
description: Advanced techniques for bringing characters to life through keyframe animation, rigging, and motion capture interpretation.
